title: Neural Wallpapers.
content:
Neural Wallpapers is your go-to source for stunning and minimalist wallpapers that feature graphics of neural networks. Our collection of high-quality wallpapers showcases the beauty and complexity of these intricate systems, set against complementary colors that make them truly pop on any device.

Whether you're a fan of tech, science, or just love the look of clean, modern design, our selection of neural network wallpapers is sure to impress. With new additions regularly added to our collection, you'll always find something fresh and exciting to update your desktop or phone background.

At Neural Wallpapers, we believe that great design should be accessible to everyone, which is why all of our wallpapers are available for free download. So why settle for a boring, generic wallpaper when you can have a stunning graphic of a neural network that's both beautiful and thought-provoking? Check out our collection today and see for yourself!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a neural network, against a background of complementary colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
